dialogues.text: Lijiye aap bhi! Friends watching from a distance are surprised. Deepak an don’t know how to react.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Nahin...hum chalte hain. They both turn back and KK smiles at his friends. Pooja g a scolding look to Shaalu who bursts out laughing. Deepak keeps looking at Shaalu as they climb on the bikes ride away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sikandar is sitting on a boat tied on the ghaat. 3-4 mall boys are sitting there, playing cards (or a number-bettin game popular in small towns).

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Bata na...kaise phansti hai ye angrejan sab? VIKRAM, looks at Sikandar with piercing eyes.

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Kaa be... bhaujaai de nahin rahi kaa aajkal? Another mallah smiles inwardly.

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Jitna poochh rahe hain wo bataao na? Thoda bahut angreji bol lete hain...

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Angreji se nahin hota. ‘Attract’ hona chaahiye. Kundan yaad hai? (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wo jo peepa-pul mein naav ghusaaya tha chootiya..abhi Sweden...ki Switzerland...kaun jaane...ghoom ke aaya apni memsab ke saath.

dialogues.speaker: MALLAH 2
dialogues.text: Aaya kya waapas? Humne suna tha rah gaya udhar hi!

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Arre kanjoos saala naav bechne waapas aaya hai. Phir jaayega.

dialogues.speaker: MALLAH 2
dialogues.text: Humko bhi videsh jaana hai.

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: (irritated) Sab bhainchod langot pakad lo humaara...hum ud ke jaa rahe hain turantey! Patta phenko! VIKRAM throws the card.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT./EXT. DEVI’S HOUSE - DAY Devi is working on a Sanskrit-text book-to-computer typin when the door bell rings. She is startled to see Mishra at the door. He is in plainclothes. She doesn’t know what to say.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Pita ji kahaan hain?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Woh toh abhi nikle hain..ghaat.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Bulaao. Mishra comes inside with probing eyes around the house. H sits and turns on the TV. Some irrelevant documentary is playing on TV. Devi makes a call to her father. She comes back with a gl of water for Mishra. She sits a little away from Mishra. Mishra intently watches TV and turns to look at Devi. He stares at her for long without looking away. Devi can fee his eyes on her and becomes uncomfortable. After a long stare.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ladka mar gaya.  20 Devi looks at him. Looks away. Goes inside the kitchen. After some time, Pathak enters the house in a hurry.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Adhik der toh nahin huyi?

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Baithiye... Pathak is waiting anxiously for Mishra to tell him someth He shuts the TV off.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ladka mar gaya hai. Kaanch andar ghus gaya tha nass mein. Body abhi post-mortem mein hai. Ye court ke kaagaz hain..bhariye. Pathak is shocked. He gestures to Devi to go inside. She doesn’t move.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Par court...

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Abetment of suicide ka case hai.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Par ladka toh aap sab ke saamne mara tha...aapse darr ke...

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Apni vidvaani jajmaan ko chootiya banaane tak hi rakhiye. Ye kaand hai kaand. Aasaani se jaayega nahin. Lamba phansegi ladki. (waits for PATHAK to say something but he doesn’t) Mahiney ka kitna kamaate hain?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Bas ghar chal jaata hai...8-10...

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Ladki padhaati hai?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Haan...coaching mein. Computer. Awkward silence

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Dekhiye...Seedhi baat karenge. Abetment aur media dono se naam hat sakta hai ladki ka.... Par vyavstha karni hogi. Teen lakh...teen mahine ka samay de rahe hain.  37 21 PATHAK is a little offended.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (in a hushed tone) Hum seedhe-saade log hain... Silence. Mishra stares at Pathak for some time. Stares at Devi.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Achha? Theek hai. Mishra starts to leave.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Nahin rukiye. Saahab rukiye. Mishra doesn’t say a thing. Pathak becomes nervous. Mishr wears his shoes and doesn’t even look at him.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ghaat pe chhoti si gumti hai humaari...Itney paise kaahan se layenege. Mishra walks towards his bike.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aap gussaiye nahin pleej.. baith ke baaat karte hain sir. (he starts crying) Ek hi beti hai. Aapse bas daya ki ummeed hai... Mishra kicks the bike to start. Pathak has tears in his e In desperation he turns off his bike and takes the key in hand. Neighbors are watching all this. Mishra looks at them so Pathak notices them too. Mishra goes back in the house an Pathak follows.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DEVI’S HOUSE - DAY Pathak sits closer to Mishra. Devi is sitting on a chair afar. Mishra looks into Pathak’s eyes while he avoids eye contact

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Aaj ke baad... kabhi bhi... kabhi hi hamse mol bhaav nahin kijiyega. Saabun nahin bechne aaye hain yahaan. 3 lakh, teen mahine. Pathak nods.  38 22

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Phone mein video hai raid ka. Agar koi phantom-pana dikhaaye, toh poore shahar mein ghuma denge video. Pathak looks at him helplessly

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Parson tak 50 hazaar ka jugaad baithaaiye. Pathak nods.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sar naahin jhulaaiye ghode ki tarah. Kya karenge?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Parson 50 haajar.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Aur...Teen mahine mein?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: 3 lakh Mishra leaves without looking at anyone of them. Both Pat and Devi are still at their positions sitting helplessly. Mishra is wearing his shoes.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: (leaving the door open) Darwaza sataa lijiye.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. HARISHCHANDRA GHAAT — DAY The lane leading up to the cremation ghaat is over-crowde Some arthi has got stuck at the sharp curve. Devi struggl to get into the lane. Her face is fully covered with dupa A shopkeeper selling pooja saamagri on the side taps on Devi’s shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: SHOPKEEPER
dialogues.text: Kidhar?

dialogues.speaker: SHOPKEEPER
dialogues.text: Ladeej log nahin ja sakti hai. (Looks at Devi’s sad face) Wahaan oopar se dekh sakti hain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi is standing at a roof-top and watching the cremation ghaats. Stream of arthis coming in. Her eyes searching for Piyush She finally sees what looks like his body. An old man, probably his father, walking beside it. He looks absolute shattered. Devi seeing the pyre on fire. EXT. HARISHCHANDRA GHAAT — DAY Piyush’s father is holding a danda and limply hitting it dead body’s skull.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Thoda zor se maariye...aatma mukt hogi. Father still can’t do it so Deepak takes his hand and hel him. They hit the skull with force and a mini-blast occur

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DEEPAK’S HOUSE - DAY Deepak, Doctor and Sikandar are sitting down and having lunch. Mother and Rani are sitting opposite to the men. Sikandar is a little away from all three. We stay with Sikandar most of the time.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Abhi kitna din aur hai kaalej?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Du mahina aur hai. Phir pareeksha. Aur saath mein placement shuru hoga.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Kya shuru hoga?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Matlab naukri..  24 Mother serves a roti to Deepak. Sikandar looks at them munching his morsel.

dialogues.speaker: SHAANTI
dialogues.text: Naukri ke liya toh paisa bhi dena padta hai na?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Sarkari naukri...Railway mein, ya bijli board mein...aur paisa nahin maangta, interview leta hai ijjat se.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Pagaar kitna? (suddenly cuts the conversation and yells at Sikandar) Oo baahar raakh dhul raha hai aur tum yahaan baith ke pagura raha hai? Sab chaandi maar lega ladka log. Sikandar is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Shambhu Chacha hai udhar...bol ke aaye hain.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (back to Deepak) Pagaar kitna deta hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Wo interview ke baad bataayega...

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Achha hai. Nikal jaao yahaan se. Jitna jaldi niklo...utna achha. Aur jab baney...toh humko bhi... Sikandar chucks his plate across to Rani. It makes a screeching noise. Everybody is silent.

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Roti. Shaanti puts a Roti and gives it to him. Awkward silence. They all continue to eat, pretending nothing happened. Sikandar has few bites and leaves angrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sikandar is standing and looking at ashes being washed by workers. (Shambhu Chacha is standing closer to workers.) worker waves a small chunk of molten metal to Sikandar. Sikandar doesn’t react. Deepak comes to the terrace. He stands by his side. Sikan waits for a moment and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DEVI’S HOUSE - DAY Pathak is counting bundles of cash and putting them in pa bags. Devi is packing food for him. The lunch box won’t shut. S tries hard but is unable to shut it. Pathak watching her. He steps forward and closes the box. He takes the box, looks at her. She avoids eye contact at first. Then meets his eye. PATHAK shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kuchh bolegi ki sab khud-hi maan lein?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Kya sun-na chaahte hain?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Tumhaari aawaaj. (after a pause) Kaun tha...kyon gayi thi...

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Coaching mein tha. Hum uska project type karte they. Wahin dosti ho gayi... (she wants to add more but keeps silent)

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Bas itna hi?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Haan. Achha laga humein us-se baat kar ke...

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Socha nahin ek baar bhi? Ye sab karne se pahle...

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Pata nahin.  44 45 26

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Ek ladka marr gaya hai...hum 3 lakh ke karje mein hain...yeh...FD tod ke 50 hajaar nikaale hain...tum jail ki chaukhat pe...aur jawaab hai "pata nahin”! Kya bolein...sab naas kar diya. Sab. Devi turns around and goes inside, angry. PATHAK walks ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pathak is handing over the packet to Mishra at a deserted point on the highway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PATHAK parks his bike at the end of the road. Stairs to t ghaat start after this. He climbs down while folding down dhoti which had to be folded up for riding the bike. Stops in front of his gumti-type shop. Peeps through the wooden-panels on the gumti and sees Jhonta sleeping insid Knocks on the panel.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Jhonta! JHONTA! The panel is opened from inside. Jhonta, half-sleepy, tou PATHAK’s feet. He is wearing only shorts that are torn fr behind. He folds his mattress.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: 3 din se nahin aaye? PATHAK doesn’t respond. Starts unloading his books from t bag onto his seat inside gumti. Jhonta is cleaning the gu PATHAK finds a beedi near his cushion.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Bola tha na yahaan beedi mat laana? Kitaabein hain.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Hum nahin..Netwa laaya tha... PATHAK gives him a stare.  46 27

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Didi bhi nahin aayi itne din se...

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Abhi bhagg yahaan se.. Jhonta is surprised and offended. He goes out and dives straight into Ganga.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pathak working on a book. Jhonta shows the coins to him excitedly.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: 26 rupaya mila ek-ay gotey mein! Aur ek-saans bhi bahut lambi chali.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Toh?

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Humko bhi khelne do na...

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kya khelne do?

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Wahi shaam mein jo sab boli lagta hai gotey pe...achha paisa milta hail!

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (irritated) Yahi bacha hai...juaa khelne dein tumko?

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Jua nahin hai...aur hum ab bahut sahi ho gaye hain! Aaj toh khelenge! PATHAK looks at him, stares angrily to cut him short.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (walking away) Lagta hai saand se marwa ke aaye ho aaj!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All friends huddled together on a computer screen in a se internet cafe. Facebook webpage is open. KK is leading th demonstration.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: (opens Pooja’s page) Yeh dekho...Pooja Chauhan. Naya photo lagaayi hai birthday ka! Chauchak ekdum! Clicks open her birthday album and leaves a comment under photo. “Luking gud!”

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Tum naam nahin poochh sakte...Pooja se.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Kya poochhein? “Tumhaari paani- bataasa waali saheli humaare dost ko bhaa gayi hai...aur usko line maarna hai. Pleej naam bata do!”

dialogues.speaker: NAVEEN
dialogues.text: Deepakwa saala sentiya gaya be...

dialogues.speaker: RUPPAN
dialogues.text: Hilaate hilaate thak gaya...aamwa gira, samjho pak gaya!

dialogues.speaker: PUSHPI
dialogues.text: Waah waah waah...

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Shakal yaad hai na?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Haan.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Toh dekho..ee Mirjapur Girl’s College ka community hai...ismein sab ladki honi chaahiye... Keeps clicking on each of the profiles and keeps asking ‘ hai?’, Deepak keeps saying ‘no’ to each of them. One prof pic has some foreign model.

dialogues.speaker: NAVEEN
dialogues.text: Ae...yeh Mirjapur ki hai?

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Haan...yahin rahti hai Geru-mahaal ke saamne...ab mooh mein le ke naacho!  48 29 Most of them have Katrina or Anushka Sharma as profile pi KK (CONT’D) Ek toh aajkal ladki log sab Katrina ka photo lagaati hai...saala ismein kaise milega?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Uske...Pooja ke album mein nahin hai photo?

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Arre sahi..uske friend mein hogi naa...pyaar mein saala dimaag tej chalta hai. He goes to Pooja’s profile again and starts looking at he friends’ list. They browse some more photos.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Yeh hai! He spots the girl. Name - SHAALU Gupta. Everybody looks at the picture. It's a simple but beautif picture of her standing at her rooftop, with a clear blue in the background. Deepak looks closely at her smile whic effortless.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Ab apna account banaao lalla! Aur aage badho.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. HARISHCHANDRA GHAAT — DAY Deepak clicking a selfie with Ganga in the background. No happy with the result. Sees Sikandar going in the distanc

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Bhaai...bhaai...idhar aa! Sikandar comes close. Deepak hands him the phone.

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Bol...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Yeh...ek selfie kheench de na!

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Photo...photo kheench.  48 48 49 30 Sikandar clicks. The pyres are in frame. Sikandar spots a foreigner girl with an Indian guide walking away and his rest on her.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (checking the pic) Arre ee chita nahin aana chaahiye...udhar se le na. Sikandar looks pissed and in a hurry to leave. The foreig girl is going away.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jaldi se kheench de na bhaai ek aur.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak’s profile is ready with photo uploaded. He goes to Shaalu’s profile, sends a friend request and writes in private message: “Bahut din se soch rahe hain. Aaj likh d hain. My name is Deepak. Hello.” INT. DEEPAK’S HOUSE/ROOM - NIGHT - Deepak looking at the printout late at night at home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi’s phone rings. The name flashing is ‘Yadav Coaching’ She doesn’t take the call. It rings again. She cuts it. Rings again - she finally ta it.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: (after a pause) Hello?

dialogues.speaker: YADAV, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Hello...Devi?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: (hesitatingly) Haan.

dialogues.speaker: YADAV
dialogues.text: Saali Randi...phone kyon bandh tha itne din se? Kahaan se chudwa ke aa gayi...? Sab pata kar liya humne...tujhe kya lagta tha..  50 51 31 She cuts the phone. Switches it off. Shaken for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DEVI’S HOUSE - DAY She is wearing her dupatta and picking her bag, wallet an leaving. (She carries men’s wallet.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi enters the coaching which is at the ground floor of residential complex. ‘Leave your shoes at the gate’ signb outside. She looks at it and instinctively about to remov her shoes. But then doesn’t, and goes inside. It looks like a spacious net-cafe inside. Everybody a bit taken aback to see Devi storming in. She goes to an empty desk, takes out her keys, and starts unlocking the cabine Yadav, sitting in a glass-partition sees her and comes ou equally taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: YADAV
dialogues.text: Ae...kya ho raha hai? Kisne kaha yahaan aane...

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: (cutting him short) Apna samaan lene aayi hoon. Aur yeh aisa gandi baaton waala phone dobara mat karna...sadak pe dauda ke maarenge! The whole office is looking at Devi and Yadav now. A coup of people who were on phone now get up and see what’s happening.

dialogues.speaker: YADAV
dialogues.text: Topper ladka tha apna...sharam nahin aayi? He charges forward but she says calmly.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Jo bhi kiya donon ne kiya. Picks up her stuff in a plastic bag and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: YADAV
dialogues.text: (shouts after her) Mara toh wo akela na!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 52 53 54 32 INT. DEVI’S HOUSE - DAY Devi is watching TV mindlessly. Some match the face show/contest is on. A gift hamper graphic is shown on TV. Devi gets up and empties contents of her bag on the bed. finds Piyush’s project file. Flips it open and sees his picture on the front page. Closes it. Searches further in bag. Gets up and takes out another bag. This is the same bag s had carried to the hotel in Chandauli. She finds the gift Piyush gave her from inside it. She wants to unpack it bu then doesn’t. Leaves it packed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PATHAK is sitting in his gumti, translating a book. A man VERMA JI, in his mid-40s is sitting next to him, waiting.

dialogues.speaker: VERMA JI
dialogues.text: Aapne kaha tha aaj mil jaayega. Printing waala khaali baitha hai...

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Bas 3 din aur...Devi thoda beemaar thi. Verma ji looks at PATHAK, probing. PATHAK adds hurriedly.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Thoda advance milega toh achha rahega.

dialogues.speaker: VERMA JI
dialogues.text: Ek toh latkaaye huye hain chamgaadad-jaisa humein... (takes out his wallet and 4 notes of 500 rupees each) Par pahli baar ho raha hai isliye... (hands over the money) Ghar par sab theek na? PATHAK gives his best fake smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small crowd has gathered on the Panchkoshi ghaat steps. VIKRAM Mallah and 4 other kids are surrounded by a few locals. PATHAK is watching the entire thing from his seat gumti.  55 56 33

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Ye...nishaan laga hua...Ye tokra bhar sikka hum paani mein phekenge. Yeh bachha log gota maarega. Dedh minute ka samay hai. Kaun sabse adhik sikka laayega, uspar aap 10 se lekar 100 rupaya, kuchh bhi laga sakte hain. He starts accepting bets from people. A few tourists also shell out money. PATHAK gets up from his seat and comes forward to watch t Though not a part of the crowd, he watches it from a safe distance. Kids (BABU, MUNWA, Netwa, LOKU) line up on the small platform, ready to jump. Jhonta looks at Pathak with plea eyes. Pathak shakes his head in a ‘no’.

dialogues.speaker: NETWA
dialogues.text: Aaj jo-jo haara wo beedi pilaayega!

dialogues.speaker: MUNWA
dialogues.text: Lauda! VIKRAM throws the coins, blows the whistle and they jump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kids dive in to look for coins. Netwa finds 5. Munwa finds one 3. Then they both come up breath. Then dive in again. PATHAK is watching as Netwa wins it. VIKRAM distributes t money and gives a 50 Rupees note to Netwa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doctor is sitting in the open on the ghaat - fully drunk. small covered area where the holy-fire is burning is just behind him. Deepak and Sikandar are working on the pyres. An older, rich, upper-caste man in a silk kurta, DUBEY, i sitting next to Doctor, drinking whiskey in a plastic cup Offers the cup to Doctor to get it refilled.  34

dialogues.speaker: DUBEY
dialogues.text: Ek aur banaaiye Dom Raja...

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (filling the cup) Arre hum kaahe ke Raja?

dialogues.speaker: DUBEY
dialogues.text: Arre Banaras mein do hi Raja hain..ek Kaasi Naresh...ek Dom Raja.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Ghanta! Yeh Shambhu Chaudhary ko dekho... (To Shambhu) Saal mein kitni baar paari aati hai teri? SHAMBHU CHAUDHARY, 65, lean, bearded, is sitting at a distance, drinking. Doesn’t respond at once. Another man, Doctor's age, LALA, joins them.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (asks loudly) Ae Shambhu chacha...saal mein kitni baar paari aati hai? Bataao saab ko...

dialogues.speaker: SHAMBHU
dialogues.text: (servile, telling Dubey) Ji saahab...10 saal mein ek din.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: 10 saal mein ek din paari aati hai Shambhu ki. Matlab uss ek din poore ghaat ki kamaai inki. Shambhu ke baap ki saal mein 1 paari aati thi. 10 bachhey ho gaye...sabki 10 saal mein ek aane lagi! Baaki bakhat Shambhu chacha lakdi uthaata hai. Suna hai aisa chootiya Raja? Agli paari kab hai Shambhu Chacha?

dialogues.speaker: SHAMBHU
dialogues.text: Ab nahin hai. Paari bech di Lala ko. 1 Lakh rupaya mila. Ab baaki umar bhikhaari. Deepak enters, trying to talk to Doctor.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Babu...mujhe...

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (ignoring Deepak) Hum bhi paari bech dein toh 10 Lakh milega...haan Lala?  57 35 Lala smiles at Doctor wryly.

dialogues.speaker: LALA
dialogues.text: Hum kah diye aur tum bech diye!

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (asks Deepak) Bech dein?

dialogues.speaker: LALA
dialogues.text: Arre ee chootiya kaa bataayega! Isko ghaat se kya lena dena? Padhe likhe babu log...

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Ladke ko gaali de di...ab toh kabhi nahin bechenge!

dialogues.speaker: LALA
dialogues.text: Waise toh tum taiyyaar baithe they na...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (interjects) Babu...thode paise do...Durga puja jaana hai doston ke saath agle hafte.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (eyes closed, pointing towards the wall in the distance) Udhar kurta hai...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: 300 rupaye le lein?

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Sab le le! Tu hi toh hai. Sikandar is pushing a burning body inside pyre.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Sikandar) Taang mod na uski bhosdi ke... Deepak leaves.

dialogues.speaker: DAY 1
dialogues.text: Durga Pooja celebrations at the local park. Durga idol in corner, remains least attended.  57 57 57 36 Almost incidental to this party of food stalls, orchestra play performances, and socializing. The crowd, mostly youngsters, are here to check each other out. A melodramatic Bengali play is being staged in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak writing a message on Shaalu’s Facebook wall. “Aaj Durga puja mein aap aayengi naa?” r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi is in a bus on the highway. Sitting on the window se Looking at the dusty, October landscape going past her. S has Piyush’s project report in her lap. She's flipping through Piyush’s project file. His full na is PIYUSH AGARWAL It has his passport-sized photo on the first page. She looks at the name of the college. r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PATHAK is watching the coin-finding competition at the gh He joins the crowd. Jhonta is standing in the distance, sipping tea. Pathak calls him with a wave of hand. Jhonta runs to him expectantly.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Aaj kitna nikaale they subah?

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Inn sabke baap se zyada!

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Dekhte hain. Jhonta runs and joins the group. Vikram Mallah looks at Pathak inquisitively and Pathak nods.

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Udhar jaa...anth mein!

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Hum pe lagaaiye...hum jeetenge....hum jeetenge! (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (spots a foreigner couple) I win...madam...I win. Pathak looks on as Vikram throws the coins and kids jump. Pathak watching anxiously as they appear over water after few seconds. Jhonta is clearly doing well and wins the competition. Some people applaud and Pathak manages a wea smile as Jhonta waves at him. Song Continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak and his friends are out in the open. KK has spotte Pooja and is already gesturing to her that she is looking good. Deepak's eyes are scanning the girls around Pooja. breaks into a smile as he sees Shaalu. Shaalu also looks at him and this time stifles a smile, indicating that she now recognizes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LATER: As the crowd is returning.

dialogues.speaker: RUPPAN
dialogues.text: Chal na dekhte hain kahaan rahti hai..

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Nahin.

dialogues.speaker: RUPPAN
dialogues.text: KK...bol na isko!

dialogues.speaker: NAVEEN
dialogues.text: KK kya bolega...khud chhata hua pada hai gaand mein! Shaalu and girls leaving. Deepak smiles at her as she loo towards him but she doesn’t acknowledge.

dialogues.speaker: RUPPAN
dialogues.text: Chal na.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (now mood upset) Nahin bola na.  57 57 57 57 38

dialogues.speaker: PUSHPI
dialogues.text: Sab Phattendra ji Maharaj hain yahaan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi is walking towards the college from inside a gate, roughly half a kilometer away on an unpaved road, Lovely Professional University can be seen. It’s a badly-designe concrete structure with a huge, tacky notice board with University name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi inside the university building. It’s clean and empty Almost ghost-campus. A lone table fan in the corridor, go left and right automatically. She heads to a notice board which has the newspaper clipp of Piyush’s death. She takes it off with shaking hands. P it in her bag. r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PATHAK takes out a 50 Rupee note and gives it to Jhonta. Jhonta bets the money on himself. The contest begins. r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi is inside the administrative office. Again, huge roo but only 3 people occupying 3 tables. 4-5 tables are lyin covered in plastic with new, untouched computer and stationery. Devi is sitting opposite a clerk. He finds the name and picture in his database. Goes cold on seeing it. Turns th computer screen towards Devi.

dialogues.speaker: CLERK
dialogues.text: Yeh? Devi struggles with her emotions, controls her voice and nods. Then looks away instantly. He turns the screen back himself.  57 57 57 39

dialogues.speaker: CLERK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeh toh guzar gaya. Haadsa ho gaya ek.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: (shows him the project file) Iski ye file hai humaare paas. Kuch paise baaki hain, ek do books bhi hain uski jo lautani hain. Aap pata de sakte hain? Clerk thinks over it for a moment...

dialogues.speaker: CLERK
dialogues.text: Number hai ghar ka. Ye addresss hai unka Allahabad mein. Note karo. Par bolna mat kahin ki maine diya hai. .»+. and turns the screen again towards her. Devi looks a screen and Piyush’s smiling face.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. BUS —- DAY Devi is in an almost empty bus for her return journey. Su setting in the background. She looks at the number on her phone. (Name saved on phon PIYUSH FATHER RAMDHARI AGARWAL) Calls. Somebody picks it at the other end. A faint sound of ‘Hello’ is heard. She can’t find the courage to respond. Cuts the call.

dialogues.speaker: DAY 3
dialogues.text: It's early for the evening rush at Durga Pooja park. Deep and friends are smoking in the open area. Shaalu, Pooja a two other girls arrive. Shaalu looks at Deepak smoking. Deepak feels awkward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak is writing a message to Shaalu on Facebook. The 'Friend Request PENDING' message can be seen on the scree  57 57 57 57 40 Deepak writes: "Hum dobara kabhi cigarette nahin piyenge. doston ne jabari mein pilaaya." r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jhonta wins the competition with maximum coins. PATHAK applauds. Jhonta gives PATHAK the winning sum of his mone PATHAK finally smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A magic show is going on. A Bengali magician, MADAN KUNDU taking unlimited paper out of his mouth. Too crowded and noisy. Deepak and friends are watching the magic show, wh Deepak is also looking around to spot Shaalu. A brush of hand past him, and he turns to see it was Shaa indeed. Did she do it deliberately? The Bengali magician made a dog disappear and is now telling everyone to look around as the dog may appear among the crowd. Some commot Deepak moves towards Shaalu, and she looks at him. But th dog appears between them and spotlights turn to Deepak. Everybody applauds as Deepak is told to pick and return t dog back on stage. Shaalu laughs at Deepak's startled expression and Deepak feels good. Manages a smile himself.

dialogues.speaker: DAY 6
dialogues.text: Deepak checking Facebook. Still "Friend Request Pending".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The orchestra is playing "Bas ik sanam chaahiye, aashiqui liye..." as Deepak and Shaalu are eyeing each other. Crowds leaving. Shaalu and friends are buying a gas ballo on their way out. Deepak also goes there and buys a gas balloon. Deepak and Shaalu look at each other. Shaalu goes ahead with her friends. Deepak waits for his gang.

dialogues.speaker: Q
dialogues.text: 58 4l Shaalu reaches the end of road, turns back, trying to fin Deepak, but there’s too much crowd. She then spots a ball going up - the same color Deepak had bought. She smiles looking at the balloon. From Deepak’s POV - He is looking at his own balloon goin and also trying to spot Shaalu in the crowd. Then he spot balloon going up - the same one Shaalu had bought. He breaks into a huge smile. Both the balloons are flying up in air. Shaalu is smiling sitting in an auto. Deepak is smiling walking on the road

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak logs in to his Facebook and finds ‘Shaalu Gupta accepted your friend request’ message pop up. He applauds joy. The netcafe worker peeps in to see what’s happening.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Pepsi laao guru...

dialogues.speaker: WORKER
dialogues.text: Pepsi nahi hai..

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Arre jo hai laao! Badi bottle. He looks at Shaalu’s smiling face in her profile picture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak and Shaalu, and KK and Pooja are sitting at two tables. KK is trying to click a picture of Pooja on his phone but is hiding her face with a bag. Awkward silence between Deepak and Shaalu.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Kya lengi aap?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Kuchh nahin.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Wo bhaga dega. Coffee?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Chaai.  42

dialogues.speaker: WAITER
dialogues.text: Chaai nahin hai. Pasta hai. Pizza hai.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Pizza?

dialogues.speaker: WAITER
dialogues.text: Haan. Margerita. Mushroom.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: 1 laaiye pahle. KK and Pooja get up.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Hum udhar hain...ghaat pe. They go towards the ghaat. Shaalu looks at Deepak accusin

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Humne nahin bola usko jaane ko. Khud se gaye hain. Awkward silence.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Toh aap Polytechnic mein padhte hain.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Haan. Civil Engineering. Final year. Beech mein ek saal strike ho gayi nahi toh ab tak...naukri-ookri lag gaya hota.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Main 2nd year mein hoon. B.Sc. Awkward silence.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Aapki hobbies kya hain?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Music.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Aap gaati hain?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Nahin. Sunti hoon. FM pe bhi aur CD laa ke bhi.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Bas music?  43

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Aur shaayari pasand hai!

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Shaayari?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Haan...Bashir Badr...Akbar Allahabadi...Mirza Ghalib...Ghalib ka naam toh suna hoga aapne? Deepak is pretending to have heard the name. Just nodding The Pizza arrives.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Lijiye. (to the waiter) Bhai wo thoda...sauce laaiye. Schezwan milega? Waiter shakes his head. Deepak and Shaalu look into each other’s eyes for a couple of seconds. Waiter puts sauce on the table.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Toh hum log ab...friend ho gaye na?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Haan. Bilkul.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Koi bhi dikkat ho...kabhi bhi...humein bataaiyega.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (now amused) Aap kya karenge?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Hum sahi kar denge. Koi chhedta hai...ya pareshaan karta hai...ya rulaata hai...bahut sab haraami ladka log hai yahaan...humein bas ek baar bataaiyega.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (now with a mischievous glint in her eyes) Achha?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (serious) Haan.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Aur maan lijiye aapne hi rulaaya toh?  59 60 44

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (now getting the joke) Aap... Shaalu bursts out laughing. Deepak, embarrassed, picks up soup bowl and gulps down the rest of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaalu and Pooja are in an auto-rickshaw i . Deepak and KK on a bike behind them at some distance. Sha keeps on turning and looking at him. He also keeps on checking himself in the bike mirror. They stop at a dista and check where she lives. KK pinches Deepak on his arm a whoops.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Ae beta kaabil ke fachaak!

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (feeling the pinch) Gandu...Itna jor se? Aahhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PATHAK and Devi outside the coaching building. This is a bigger coaching than Yadav’s. A 2-storied building with n exterior and more professional looking notice board. They are talking while entering.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Adhik bolne ki jarurat nahin hai. Tirpathi ji ka beta manager hai.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Lekin paise ki baat toh karni hogi na! A peon spots them.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Sanjay Tripathi ji se milna tha...kaho Vidyacharan PATHAK aaye hain... Peon takes them inside a waiting chamber. They now talk i whispers.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Do mahine ka samay diya hai. Us-se pahile Mishra ko sab chukana hai. Jo mile chupchaap le lena.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Bhikhaari hain kya hum?  45

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (losing his temper) Bhikhaari nahin kukur hain... They hear SANJAY TRIPATHI entering. He is a pot-bellied, balding, but smartly dressed 28-year old. He has a file folder in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: SANJAY TRIPATHI
dialogues.text: (touching PATHAK’s feet) Pranaam Aacharya ji. He takes the seat opposite them.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kaise ho beta?

dialogues.speaker: SANJAY TRIPATHI
dialogues.text: Bas Acharya ji...chal raha hai. Tum Devi ho...right? Devi nods but doesn’t smile. SANJAY TRIPATHI (CONT’D) Acharya ji ne humein 10-vi tak Sanskrit padhaaya. (to peon) Chai laao bhai!

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Nahin chai nahin...bas...thoda jaldi mein hain. Kitaab ka kaam atka pada hai... He flips open the file-folder.

dialogues.speaker: SANJAY TRIPATHI
dialogues.text: Pakka? (to the peon) Achha beta paani le aao...matke ka laana! (to Devi) Haan maine CV dekha...achha padh likh gayi ho! Yahaan bas filhaal vacancy nahin hai instructor ki. Par reception pe join kar sakti ho. Naye students jo aate hain...unki counselling bhi karni hogi aur chhota-mota data-entry job bhi. Uska extra milega. Baaki monthly five and a half K. Devi is mulling over it but PATHAK gets up.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Theek hai ekdum. Kal se aa jaayegi subah. Dhanyawaad bahut!  61 61 46 Devi gets up too and so does Sanjay Tripathi.

dialogues.speaker: SANJAY TRIPATHI
dialogues.text: Arre nahin Acharya ji...aapne itna kiya hai humaare liye. His phone starts ringing. SANJAY TRIPATHI (CONT’D) Sorry yeh call...aap paani pee ke jaaiyega. Naya matka laaye hain hum log...bahut meetha hai! He walks away with his phone. Peon brings the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak is on the phone, looking down at the ghaats. His father and brother are working the pyres. r/c

dialogues.speaker: E/I. SHAALU'S TERRACE/HOUSE
dialogues.text: Shaalu is on her terrace, seeing kites flying.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Suniye: (reads from a Bashir Badr Shayari book in her hand) Sitaaron ko aankhon mein mehfuz rakhna, badi der tak raat hi raat hogi; Musaafir hain hum bhi,musafir ho tum bhi, kisi mod par phir mulaaquat hogi.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Samjha nahin.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Aap bahut budhhu hain. (then in a low tone) Aur pyaare bhi.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (excited) Kya kya kya?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (shy and giggling) Kuch nahin kuchh nahin.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Humne sun liya!  47

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Aapko Chakbast suna denge toh behosh hi ho jaayenge!

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Aapka Happy Birthday aane waala hai. Humne...Facebook pe dekha.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Lekin Facebook ne ek cheez nahi bataayi aapko.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Picnic! A faint call for Shaalu is heard. Hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lagta hai Maa bula rahi hai...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Theek hai jaaiye...aur pleej...’aap’ mat boliye. Tum boliye.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (now climbing down the stairs, talking in whispers) Pahle 2 sher yaad kar ke sunaaiye... (Spots mother) Achha bye.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Hello? Looks at his phone. Stops the record button. Plays again. conversation starts playing from the top.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: Suniye: Tu kisi rail si guzarti hai, main kisi pull sa thartharaata hoon, ek jungle hai teri aankhon mein, main jismein raah bhool jaata hoon... Shaalu’s recorded voice-over plays on Sikandar talking to foreigner girl on the ghaat. Foreigner walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naau (Barber) is shaving a kid’s head. PATHAK is doing th basic rituals of mundan sanskaar with the kid’s parents. small fire is burning in an iron-havankund.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (mumbling the mantra) Ab aap hawan saamagri daalein... The parents pour a couple of small packets in the fire.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ab ghee daaliye.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Ghee? Liya tha kya?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Naa.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (looks for Jhonta) Koi baat nahin. Humara ladka le aayega turant. Looks around, doesn’t spot him. r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jhonta is fascinated by the same Durga Puja Park magician (MADAN KUNDU) showing a trick to the people. He is watchi from the roof of a shop. Kundu is taking unlimited amount paper out of his mouth. Jhonta applauds. Throws a one-rup coin on the magician. Magician looks up and Jhonta waves at him. r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The evening crowd is gathering for the competition. PATHA part of the crowd. Jhonta is still missing. The kids are lining up for the dive.

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Kaa pandijji? Jhonta kahaan hai?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Nahin pata.  49

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: (announcing) 4 bachhey...gota lagaayenge...aur ye sikkey nikaalenge. Kaun jeetega...aap lagaaiye boli. 50 se lekar 200 tak... (tells the kids) Jaao beta..ek sample dikhaao sabko. The kids dive in. PATHAK takes out the money. Still waiti for Jhonta. r/c 62 A(i) EXT. KABIR CHAURAHA - DAY Madan Kundu is now doing his dog trick. He takes a street puppy-dog and makes it disappear. Jhonta’s eyes are scanning the space to find the dog. r/c 62 (ii) EXT. PANCHKOSHI GHAAT - DAY The coin-finding game is over. PATHAK has lost money.

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Kitna haare gurudev?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: 570 rupaya.

dialogues.speaker: VIKRAM
dialogues.text: Par aap kaahe khelne lage ye sab? PATHAK doesn’t respond and walks away. r/c 62 A(ii)EXT. KABIR CHAURAHA - DAY

dialogues.speaker: MADAN KUNDU
dialogues.text: Ab kutta milna hi maangta hai. Nahin toh tum log bolega...eh shaala Madan Kundu fraud! He turns his attention towards the crowd. Drum rolls. All silent, attentive and expectant. Jhonta’s scream drowns t silence.  63 50

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Mil gaya! (he picks up a dog, that looks very similar to magician’s missing dog)

dialogues.speaker: MIL GAYA MUJHE
dialogues.text: Kundu looks at Jhonta, people are beginning to applaud, b Kundu raises his hand to stop them. Then points at a clue man and twirls his fingers. The original dog walks out fr between his legs. He is dumbfounded. Jhonta is disappoint Crowd applauds wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jhonta walks on to the ghaat with the puppy. Sits close t PATHAK’s gumti.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kahaan they?

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Masti.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kaam ke time masti? Bahut gooda aa gaya!

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Apne paise se gaye they...aapki kaahe sulag rahi hai? He starts walking with the puppy. PATHAK gets up and hold his arm, tight and hurting.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kal se gota maarne ke time yahaan rahoge. Aur tumhara paisa hum rakhenge!

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Kaahe?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kaahe ki tum shahanshah na bann jaao...aur sab uda na do. Jab bade ho jaaoge, tab le lena. Hisaab se rakhenge!

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Hum didi se bol denge...

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Bolo jo bolna hai.  64 65 51 Lets go of his hand. Jhonta has tears in his eyes. PATHAK gets back to his work. Jhonta picks up flower-plates from shop and goes off (for selling.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi is at the reception desk. Explaining the course modu to a father and his 14-year old son. A peon, BABLU (26), hangs about, letching at Devi. Devi scribbles something on the form. Places her signatur too. They leave. Devi sits back and realizes Bablu is eye her all this while.

dialogues.speaker: BABLU
dialogues.text: (fills her glass of water from the jug) Aap achha samjhaati hain! Devi nods. She is still in the moment of the father-son conversation.

dialogues.speaker: BABLU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pahli naukri hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Nahin.

dialogues.speaker: BABLU
dialogues.text: Pichhli naukri kya huyi?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Kaam achha nahin tha.

dialogues.speaker: BABLU
dialogues.text: (smiles) Mujhe pata hai aap Yadav ke udhar thi. Devi avoids looking at him. Gets up and goes to the print

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. DEVI’S HOUSE - NIGHT Devi is opening the door when some one jumps on her. She startled but holds her scream on realizing it’s Jhonta.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Pagla gaye kya? Jhonta is also surprised by Devi’s reaction.  66 52

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Aap itne din se aayi hi nahin. Devi looks at his sad face and manages a faint smile. Ope the door.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DEVI’S HOUSE - NIGHT Devi is serving meal to Jhonta. She also sits alongside w her plate.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Pandijji aaj kal bauraaye rahte hain.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Haan...thode pareshaan hain.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Aap bhi?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Nahin main nahin.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Kaahe pareshaan hain, Pandijji?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Pata nahin.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Paisa kam ho gaya hai? (Silence from Devi) Hum ek din nahin aaye gota lagaane toh bamak gaye!

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Tum gota lagaate ho? Paise ke liye?

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Roj jeet-te hain. Aur kah dena unko...jyada haath waath chhodey humpe toh gaayab ho jaayenge.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Kahaan gaayab ho jaaoge?

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Kahin bhi. Badi jagah.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Badi jagah kyon?  67 53

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Badi jagah mein koi humein khoj nahin sakta. (points towards daal haandi) Daal aur milega? Devi gives him some daal. Thinks about what Jhonta just s about ‘badi jagah’.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak plays the CD. All friends listen attentively.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Tu kisi rail si guzarti hai, main kisi pull sa thartharaata hoon...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Humne kabhi dhyaan hi nahin diya. Sab pasand hai.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Sab kaise pasand ho sakta hai? Humein barsaat pasand hai. The voice stops and music starts. A song ‘Aaj mausam, bad imaan hai...’ plays.

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Tuney uski aawaaz record ki?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Haan. Phone mein. Phir uski baaton se gaane jodey. Friends are a bit surprised at how emotional Deepak is ab the gift. They steal glances at each other curiously.

dialogues.speaker: PUSHPI
dialogues.text: (encouraging) Badhiya hai!

dialogues.speaker: RUPPAN
dialogues.text: Ladki upper-caste hai bhaai...zyada senti-venti mat ho jaana. Usey pata hai na tere baare mein? Deepak fumbles for an answer.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Pata nahin.  68 54

dialogues.speaker: RUPPAN
dialogues.text: Amaa bata do pahle, phir aage badho. Sab samajhdaar hi milein iss shahar mein zaroori nahin...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Haan socha toh hai...par... Naveen sees Deepak’s discomfort and cuts in.

dialogues.speaker: NAVEEN
dialogues.text: Abe ye sab baad ki baat hai...naukri lag gayi toh launda bawaal hai apna.Aur Ruppan bhai...bike ki chaabi do ladke ko! Abhi isko ek aur surprise dena hai.

dialogues.speaker: RUPPAN
dialogues.text: Kya? Kahin ghumaane le jaa raha hai? Naveen looks at Deepak and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: E/I. VARANASI-ALLAHABAD HIGHWAY/ALLAHABAD/BUS
dialogues.text: Shaalu and other girls in a mini-bus on the highway. They singing Hindi film songs, playing Antakshari. Pooja Chauhan taps Shaalu’s shoulder and points towards t window. Shaalu spots Deepak riding a bike, coming towards them. She looks excited and nervous. The old teacher in t van is sleeping. There is some traffic ahead and their bus slows down. Dee catches up with them but Shaalu and Pooja gesture him to ‘shushh’ as the teacher may notice him. He gestures her t get out of the bus and sit with him. Pooja takes Shaalu’s scarf and throws it out of the windo And the girls start screaming ‘Bus roko bus roko..’

dialogues.speaker: TEACHER
dialogues.text: (half sleepy) Kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: POOJA
dialogues.text: Madam..wo scarf ud gaya. Hum laa rahe hain! The bus stops and 3 girls get out, giggling. Pooja and another girl come back while Shaalu waits for the bus to leave. She sits on the bike with Deepak and he starts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are riding a small distance behind the bus.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Pata hai hum ladke log aisi bus ko kya bolte hain?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Maal gaadi! She hits him on the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Achha aapne bataaya nahin...kahaan rahte ho? Deepak’s face tightens a bit.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Udhar hi...Bhelupur ke aagey.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Achha? Wo Prerna bhi Bhelupur mein rahti hai. Tab toh hum uske ghar ka bahaana kar ke aa sakte hain! Deepak stays silent, thinking.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (fumbling) Ghar aaogi humaare? Maa-baap...wo kya kahenge...

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Aap kahte hain toh nahin aayenge. Deepak takes out the DJMan from his bag and hands it over her.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Yeh suno! Tumhara budday gift. Shaalu puts the speakers on and her faint voice from the phone conversation is heard. She smiles widely. A song starts as her voice fades. “Pya ka dard hai, meetha meetha...pyaara pyaara...” The song takes over as the bike rides on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Song ("Pyaar ka dard hai”) continues playing. - Shaalu and Deepak in Allahabad. Having Chinese food at Civil Lines road-side stall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Shaalu and Deepak in a book shop cum stationery. Shaalu selecting books, Deepak checking out funky key-chains and erasers. Buys one heart-shaped eraser and gifts to Shaalu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Shaalu and Deepak walking on the ghaats - holding hands

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Shaalu and Deepak in a boat. Going towards Sangam.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (looking away, at the river) Pahle Sangam aaye ho kabhi?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (looking at Shaalu) Naa.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Hum toh bahut baar aaye hain. Abhi thode din baad Badrinath-Kedarnath jaa rahe hain...bus se. Saare log...mama-chacha...dadi-nani... Their boat reaches the ghaat. Deepak gets down first and Shaalu is about to jump, the boat hits another boat and g a jerk. Shaalu is about to fall but Deepak gives her a ha

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. ALLAHABAD GHATS — DAY They are at the ghaat, in a lonely corner with water arou them on all sides. Sitting peacefully by the river.  70 57

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Tum ghar mein sabse chhoti ho, hai na?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Haan. Kaise pata?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Ghar mein sabse chhote hi aise kood- kood ke baat karte hain! (laughs ) She slaps on his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Chhoti hoon isiliye sab itna pyaar karte hain. (shows the gold and diamond ring on her finger) Bachpan mein pehnaayi thi Chachu ne...aur ye ab atak hi gayi hai. Ungli badi ho gayi...angoothi utni hi rah gayi. Their eyes meet. Deepak is looking at her with an intense gaze.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aise kyon dekh rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Pata nahin. He bends forward and kisses her lightly on lips. She is uncomfortable for a moment. Also in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Chhoti ho na sabse...isliye pyaar aa gaya. At this she breaks into a smile and he smiles too. But sm vanishes as he bends forward again. This time she is read The kiss goes from gentle to hot to the best Sangam has e witnessed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Song continues. Deepak is licking his lips and riding in a daze. They are their way back now. Riding a bit behind the bus.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Shaalu...shaadi karogi humse?  70 58

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Pata nahin.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Ghar waale maanenge tumhaare?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Pata nahin. Milna hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Milwaaogi?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Apne ghar ka pata toh bataaya nahin...humaare ghar aane ki badi jaldi hai! Deepak goes silent for a bit. Song fades out.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (mildly irritated) Bataaye toh...Bhelupur ke paas rahte hain.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Kahaan?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (fake bravado) Chalna hai? Abhi le ke chalein?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (sensing it) Haan haan...chalo. Deepak doesn’t like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaalu is off the bike and Deepak is clearly pissed, uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Ab yahaan se rickshaw mil jaayega.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (still in teasing mode) Aapka ghar kahin Sarnath-varnath toh nahin hai.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (now losing it) Kaahe? Kya karna hai? Ek baar bole na yahin hai Bhelupur ke paas...tab se lekin yahi laga hua hai...aur koi baat nahin hai kya?  71 59 Shaalu is thrown off by this sudden anger. She tries to c him.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Arre hum mazaak kar rahe...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Mazaak hai yeh? Bataayein kahaan rahte hain? Sun-na hai? Shaalu doesn’t say anything.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ghaat pe rahte hain. Harish-chandra ghaat pe. Wahin paida huye they. Lakdi uthaana...murda jalaana...yahi sab kaam hai humaara. Hum, humaare baap-chacha- bhai...sab yahi karte hain. Samajh gayi kahaan rahte hain? Chalna hai? (starts the bike) Chalo? Aao...baitho. Le ke chalein. She just keeps looking at him with hurt as he rides away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi is in the corridor, making a call. The phone rings a she starts pacing faster.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE VOICE
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Uh...Mister Ramdhari Agarwal...se baat ho sakti hai?

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE VOICE
dialogues.text: Kaun? She is silent. Composes herself.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Main...Airtel se bol rahi hoon. Gurgaon.

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE VOICE
dialogues.text: (before hanging up) Sorry. Nahin chaahiye. Devi shakes her head in frustration. Turns around to see Bablu standing there.  72 73 60

dialogues.speaker: BABLU
dialogues.text: Seedhe seedhe poochhte hain. Devi is confused about what he is talking.

dialogues.speaker: BABLU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Degi kya? Bol na. Devi looks at him disoriented.

dialogues.speaker: BABLU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kisi ko nahin bolenge. Usko bhi toh diya tha. Shaam ko rukna 8 baje ke baad. Devi stares at him angrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devi walks up to PATHAK’s gumti. She is conscious of the around. At the gumti PATHAK is setting up books. He gets uncomfortable with Devi coming there.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Naukri chhorh di.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (controlling anger) Tumhe yahan aane ke liye kisne kaha tha. Jaao yahan se. Devi just walks away in anger. Jhonta holds her hand and drags her towards the ghaat.

dialogues.speaker: JHONTA
dialogues.text: Kitna time ho gaya. Aap aayi nahin didi. Ek naya kartab dikhate hain.. Aao.. Aao.. Jhonta stands by the ghaat. Does a reverse summersault in the river. He comes out with mouthful of coins. Devi is g already.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DEVI’S HOUSE - NIGHT Devi is looking at her desktop screen. Allahabad universi wikipedia page is open. PATHAK is just back from work, th jhola of books is still on his shoulders. (Devi is mindle clicking on ‘refresh desktop’ while talking.)

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Naukri chhorh di matlab?  61 Silence from Devi. PATHAK sighs and drops his bag to get glass of water. Comes back and slumps in the chair.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kyon aisi ho gayi tu? Kya chaahti hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Kuchh nahin.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Humne kab kuchh karne se roka? Kya galti ki jo itna bada kaand kar aayi? Ladkon jitni chooot diye bachpan se...

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Koi kaand nahin kiya maine.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (takes out day’s collections from his bag) Toh yeh kya hai? Kaand nahin hai toh kya hai yeh? (throws money on the floor) Ye mar mar ke paisa juta rahe hain...yeh kya hai? Mohalle mein ghaat pe koi rok ke poochh na le ki Devi aajkal dikhti nahin yahi sochte rahte hain...wo kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Aapka darr hai! Isiliye maine soch liya hai...yahaan rehna hi nahin. Jitni chhoti jagah...utni chhoti soch.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Humaari soch chhoti hai? Iss sab ke baad bhi tum ghar mein ho sammaan se...soch chhoti hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Jatana pad raha hai na! Aur sach ye hai ki aapko kuchh pata hi nahin mere baare mein...

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kaahe ka badla le rahi hai?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Maa ka!

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Maa ki shakal bhi yaad hai tujhe? 6 saal ki thi tu...  73 62

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: 6 saal ke bachhey andhey hote hain kya?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Tumko lagta hai Maa ko humne maara?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Toh aapko lagta hai uss ladke ko maine maara? Boliye? Maine maara kya usey? (clicks on a few folders on desktop) Khud mar gaya.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Kahaan ki baat kahaan le jaa rahi ho?

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Kahin nahin. Aap chinta na karein. Jail nahin jaaoungi.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Sab kuchh khud hi maan liya hai tumne.

dialogues.speaker: DEVI
dialogues.text: Paise juta loongi. PATHAK is about to respond to this when Devi absentminded clicks on a folder and some instrumental, light music sta playing. She lets it play, PATHAK doesn’t say a word, and keeps on observing Devi with a defeated look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pathak is riding his CD100 bike on an empty stretch of th highway. He spots Mishra standing ahead by the road. Pathak is handing a packet with cash to him.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Kitna hai?

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: (meekly) Filhaal toh 30 hai. Mishra gives him a stare.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Aage Pappu ki dukaan hai scooter ki...udhar bech do jaa ke. 10-15 iska bhi mil jaayega.  74 63

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Nahin ab hum kama rahe hain...ek jugaad baitha hai...pakka ab paisa ho jaayega. Bike bech denge toh...

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: Yeh footkar nahin chalega. (returns the packet to Pathak) Aapko kitna baar bolna padega? Pathak looks down, hands folded.

dialogues.speaker: PATHAK
dialogues.text: Agle hafte tak nahin hua iss mahine ka hissa toh bech denge. Le lijiye... Mishra takes the money.

dialogues.speaker: MISHRA
dialogues.text: 20 laaiyega agle hafte. Starts his bike. EXT. HARISHCHANDRA GHAAT — DAY A French lady, MARION (36), is taking pictures of the bur pyres. Sikandar appears in her frame.

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Permission?

dialogues.speaker: MARION
dialogues.text: What? Désolée.

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: You permission? Photo not allowed. Holy fire. Holy dead body.

dialogues.speaker: MARION
dialogues.text: (instantly apologetic) Je suis désolée. Really. I am sorry. I will delete.

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: (sensing her weakness, emphatically) Yes. Please. Not allowed. Bad.

dialogues.speaker: MARION
dialogues.text: (checking the photos again) Oh this is a beautiful shot! (showing it to Sikandar) Can I keep this? S'il vous plait! Please!  75 64

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Ok.

dialogues.speaker: MARION
dialogues.text: Aww merci!

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: You which country?

dialogues.speaker: MARION
dialogues.text: Oh...I am French. (assesses Sikandar) You work here? Stay here?

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Yes yes. You want guide? I know Banaras. I show you. Banaras. She looks at him with a slight mischief in eyes then goes ‘Naah’ and walks away. Sikandar follows her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sikander following Marion in the background while Deepak trying to make a phone call to Shaalu. She doesn’t take h call. Deepak is distressed. Two guys come on a bike and stop in front of Deepak.

dialogues.speaker: GUY 1
dialogues.text: Ae...Deepak...?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Haan...?

dialogues.speaker: GUY 2
dialogues.text: Bahut miss call jaa raha hai Shaalu ko?

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (fumbles ) Kaun? Kaun Shaalu?

dialogues.speaker: GUY 1
dialogues.text: Du chamaat maarenge na sab yaad aa jaayega. Ab suno... Deepak feels slightly threatened so starts fidgeting and looking for help.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: (calling out) Sikandar...  76 77 65

dialogues.speaker: GUY 1
dialogues.text: (starting the bike) Ladki ko call karna bandh karo...agli baar katta le ke aayenge seedhe. They race away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shaalu is studying and crying at the same time. Deepak’s is ringing on her phone but she doesn’t take it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Family having dinner. Shaalu’s father and her elder broth (Guy 2 on the bike) sitting on the sofa, mother sitting o chair, and Shaalu on the floor. The TV is playing a music reality show. One kid is singing a Bhajan on the show ("S ke sab saathi, dukh mein na koye..."”) SHAALU’S FATHER Yeh nahin jeetega launda... SHAALU’S MOTHER Kaahe? Achha toh gaa raha hai. SHAALU’S FATHER Yeh bhajan-wajan aajkal kaun sunta hai. Koi vote nahin bhejega isko. SHAALU’S BROTHER SMS waise bhi 7 rupaya kaat-ta hai yeh sab show mein. SHAALU’S FATHER Wahi hai...pyaar mohabbat ka hi geet sunta hai sab aaj...yahi log toh mahaul kharaab kiye hain. Shaalu listening carefully now. Her brother looking at he with a ‘shall I spill your secret’ gaze. Shaalu avoids hi SHAALU’S MOTHER Arre wo Sonal nahin hai, Vibha ki bitiya...khud se ladka khoj laayi kaalej ka. Saath mein MBA kar raha tha... SHAALU’S FATHER Achha? MBA kar rahi thi wo?  78 78 66 SHAALU’S MOTHER Arre bataaye toh they...itna kood- kood ke phone ki thi Vibha. Indore mein ki jaane kahaan koi bada kaalej hai MBA ka..

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: IIM Indore. SHAALU’S MOTHER Aur ladka Bangali hai..pata nahin kaun jaat ka... The bhajan ends on TV. SHAALU’S FATHER Ab yahi hai...aadhunikta ke naam pe desh bigaad diya hai cinema waalon ne. Shaalu sips water uncomfortably in the middle of eating. Mother gets up and takes Shaalu’s plate. SHAALU’S MOTHER Chalo bhai..baithne ka wakhat nahin hai...kal subah subah nikalna hai. Packing ho gayi tumhaari? Shaalu nods and goes up to her room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Packing being done for the 4-dhaam yaatra. Shaalu listeni to Deepak’s CD and her own voice.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: (from the CD) Pata hai aap baaki ladkon jaise nahin hain!

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: (from the CD) Nahin pata. Kaise?

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. SHAALU’S HOUSE - DAY Shaalu and family loading their luggage in a tourist bus.  78 79 79 67

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Aapke andar ek imaandaari hai. Jaisi Nida Fazli ki ghazalon mein hoti hai.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Haha. Ab yeh Nida Fazli kaun hai?

dialogues.speaker: I/E. BUS/ROAD
dialogues.text: Shaalu and family in the bus full of other similar famili with a banner of Badrinath-Kedarnath on the side.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Yahi toh aapki imaandaari hai!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. DHAABA — DAY Shaalu and family at a road-side dhaaba. The tourist bus waiting in the distance. She finishes her meal quickly an steps out with her phone. Holding the phone awkwardly wit greasy, unwashed hands, she makes a call. r/c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deepak is at the Mirzapur Ghaat, with his friends when he takes the call.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Aa gayi yaad?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Uss din gussa aap huye they aur ab humein taana de rahe hain? A moment’s silence.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Humne toh nahin maanga sorry.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Muft mil raha hai...le lo.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (smiles) Le liya.  68

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Hum gadhey hain.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Wo toh hain.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Humko baat karne ki tameez nahin hai.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: (realizing her parents are calling her from the distance) Achha suniye...abhi humko jaana hoga. Bas aawaaz sun-ne ke liye phone kiya tha.

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Kahaan pahunche?

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Abhi toh UP hi cross nahin hua. Saharanpur. Achha suniye na...humaare mummy-papa aapko kabhi accept nahin karenge. Bahut...wahi...ghisi-piti puraani soch hai. Deepak’s smile fades. He just listens without responding.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lekin hum aapke saath hain. Aur humne suna hai...baad mein sab maan jaate hain. Bas aap wahaan se nikal jaaiye...uss ghaat se...uss zindagi se...

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Haan...main koshish kar raha hoon..abhi placement season aa raha hai...poori jaan laga denge.

dialogues.speaker: SHAALU
dialogues.text: Bas, yahi! Baaki hum dekh lenge...bhaag ke jaana hoga toh bhaagenge. Shaalu’s brother is approaching her now. She hangs up. Deepak looks at the phone and lets what she just said sin in. He then kisses the phone screen and starts running aw

dialogues.speaker: KK
dialogues.text: Kaa hua ji? Kahaan jaa raha hai?  80 80 80c 69

dialogues.speaker: DEEPAK
dialogues.text: Abe padhna hai...ghar jaa rahe hain. The friends share a look. Deepak disappears around the be

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DEEPAK’S HOUSE/KITCHEN - NIGHT Deepak is in the kitchen, studying. The print-out of Shaa Facebook profile, with her small photo at the top is in Deepak’s lap. Noisy celebrations going on in the hall and courtyard. Loud music plays while Deepak is trying to concentrate on his books. r/c EXT. DEEPAK’S HOUSE/TERRACE - NIGHT Outside: Around 10-12 male members of Dom community eatin drinking, dancing, and chatting. Lala, Shambhu, and (uppe caste man) Dubey ji, among them.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (making another drink) Abhi aadha din hi hua hai aur 60 hazaar aa chuka hai...

dialogues.speaker: SIKANDAR
dialogues.text: Aur ee Shambhu chacha apni paari bech diya gadhau! Kaahe chacha? Murgi ekey baar mein kaat diye?

dialogues.text: Ruko tani... Jhonta keeps on walking.

dialogues.text: Shambhu chacha pata kiye hain...Lala sirf 90 hajaar diya Sikandar ko...

dialogues.text: (heavily drunk) Tumhare Sanjay mama ek baar ek nabbe saal ki budhiya ka shav jala rahe they. Budhiya ke paas sone ka daant tha. Parivar walon ne bola nikalo isey. dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aisa tamasha roj-roj jhel paoge tum bhosdi wale? He starts belching and feeling dizzy. Deepak makes him si upright. Deepak looks into his welling eyes. He breaks down. Deepak holds him. He makes him lie down o the ghaat.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya kiye tum padh likh ke? Aur kya kiya Sikandar ghaat pe rah ke?

Bhaago bhosdiwale, jaao... jaao yahan se.. Jaao, yahan kuch nahin hai murdon ke beech mein, jaao madarchod.. He starts crying and slapping Deepak. Deepak just takes i without resisting. He takes a look at the r wrapped in Facebook page, looks at Shaalu’s picture, beco overwhelmed, and throws the ring and the paper in the riv But instantly realizes what he has done and jumps in to t and find it. Struggles for a bit in the dark and then keeps on swimmin Reaches the other end of the river, the small island in t middle of Ganga, and looks back at the ghaats he jumped f  129 130 131 132 133 134 95 Everything looks distant, small, less intimidating from h He could spot his father, the burning pyres, the faint li coming out of his house, but nothing is affecting him. dialogues.speaker: SADHYA JI, (CONT'D)
